PackageOracle.name: DA_OFFERING
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_OFFERING
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.02.441476000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,offering_cd IN VARCHAR2
,offering_nm IN VARCHAR2
,offering_desc IN VARCHAR2
,offering_start_dt IN DATE
,offering_end_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,offering_cd IN VARCHAR2
,offering_nm IN VARCHAR2
,offering_desc IN VARCHAR2
,offering_start_dt IN DATE
,offering_end_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,offering_id IN NUMBER
,offering_cd IN VARCHAR2
,offering_nm IN VARCHAR2
,offering_desc IN VARCHAR2
,offering_start_dt IN DATE
,offering_end_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,offering_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_offering;

body.name: DA_OFFERING
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_OFFERING
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.02.452993000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,offering_cd IN VARCHAR2
,offering_nm IN VARCHAR2
,offering_desc IN VARCHAR2
,offering_start_dt IN DATE
,offering_end_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_offering.add(fx), parms=' || offering_cd || '|' || offering_nm || '|' || offering_desc || '|' || offering_start_dt || '|' || offering_end_dt || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_offering a
(
a.offering_id
,a.offering_cd
,a.offering_nm
,a.offering_desc
,a.offering_start_dt
,a.offering_end_dt
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_offering_id.NEXTVAL
,add.offering_cd
,add.offering_nm
,add.offering_desc
,add.offering_start_dt
,add.offering_end_dt
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.offering_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_offering.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,offering_cd IN VARCHAR2
,offering_nm IN VARCHAR2
,offering_desc IN VARCHAR2
,offering_start_dt IN DATE
,offering_end_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_offering.add, parms=' || offering_cd || '|' || offering_nm || '|' || offering_desc || '|' || offering_start_dt || '|' || offering_end_dt || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_offering a
(
a.offering_id
,a.offering_cd
,a.offering_nm
,a.offering_desc
,a.offering_start_dt
,a.offering_end_dt
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_offering_id.NEXTVAL
,add.offering_cd
,add.offering_nm
,add.offering_desc
,add.offering_start_dt
,add.offering_end_dt
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_offering.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,offering_id IN NUMBER
,offering_cd IN VARCHAR2
,offering_nm IN VARCHAR2
,offering_desc IN VARCHAR2
,offering_start_dt IN DATE
,offering_end_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_offering.add, parms=' || offering_id || '|' || offering_cd || '|' || offering_nm || '|' || offering_desc || '|' || offering_start_dt || '|' || offering_end_dt || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_offering a
(
a.offering_id
,a.offering_cd
,a.offering_nm
,a.offering_desc
,a.offering_start_dt
,a.offering_end_dt
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.offering_id
,add.offering_cd
,add.offering_nm
,add.offering_desc
,add.offering_start_dt
,add.offering_end_dt
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_offering.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,offering_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_offering.del, parms=' || offering_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_offering a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.offering_id = del.offering_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_offering.del');

END del;

END da_offering;
